name: getNetworkSmUsers
description: List the owners in an SM network with various specified fields and filters

scope.description: Specifiy a scope (one of all, none, withAny, withAll, withoutAny, withoutAll) and a set of tags.

$ul: **adGroups**: Active Directory Groups the user belongs to.
**asmGroups**: Apple School Manager Groups the user belongs to.
**azureAdGroups**: Azure Active Directory Groups the user belongs to.
**hasIdentityCertificate**: A boolean indicating if the user has an associated identity certificate..
**hasPassword**: A boolean denoting if the user has a password associated with the record.
**id**: The Meraki managed Id of the user record.
**isExternal**: Whether the user was created using an external integration, or via the Meraki Dashboard.
**samlGroups**: SAML Groups the user belongs to.
**tags**: The set of tags the user is scoped to.
**userThumbnail**: The url where the users thumbnail is hosted.
